imdb.plot outline: The Zander Show is a situational sketch comedy show produced by and starring Alec and Edward Lesnick while they were students at University of Southern California. It is intended as a showcase for their style and originality. The show aired on USC's Trojan Vision. Every week, Alec and Ed were given a topic for the segment by the channel. From there, they were solely responsible for putting together everything from plot conception to production to editing.
imdb.title: The Zander Show
plot: _The Zander Show_ (qv) is a situational sketch comedy show produced by and starring Alec and Edward Lesnick while they were students at University of Southern California. It is intended as a showcase for their style and originality. The show aired on USC's Trojan Vision. Every week, Alec and Ed were given a topic for the segment by the channel. From there, they were solely responsible for putting together everything from plot conception to production to editing.::Edward J. Lesnick
